news.title: AI Breakthrough in Medicine
news.description: Researchers have developed an AI that diagnoses rare diseases.
news.content: A team of scientists announced today that a new AI system can identify over 200 rare diseases with high accuracy...

comments.author: John Doe
comments.content: This is amazing! AI is really changing healthcare.

comments.author: Jane Smith
comments.content: We need to be cautious though. AI should support doctors, not replace them.

news.title: New Policy on Renewable Energy
news.description: Government announces a 10-year renewable energy roadmap.
news.content: The government unveiled a long-term plan to shift 60% of national energy consumption to renewable sources...
